predictions.text: U.S. nonfarm payrolls (total, SA) for October 2025 will print between +130,000 and +190,000 in the BLS Employment Situation release due 2025-11-07.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the October 2025 change in total nonfarm payroll employment (seasonally adjusted) in the BLS Employment Situation news release; success if the reported change is within +130,000 to +190,000.
monitoring_signals: ADP National Employment Report
Initial and continuing jobless claims
ISM Manufacturing and Services Employment indices
Challenger layoffs report
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and soft survey employment subindices suggest a below-trend NFP but not a collapse.

predictions.text: U.S. insured unemployment (continuing claims, seasonally adjusted) will print at or above 1.90 million in at least one weekly Department of Labor report by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if any Weekly UI Claims news release through 2025-11-30 reports seasonally adjusted continuing claims at or above 1,900,000 for any reference week.
monitoring_signals: Initial claims four-week average trend
Hiring freeze announcements and layoff trackers
NFIB hiring plans and difficulty filling jobs
Indeed job postings index
predictions.rationale: Hiring has cooled and separations are rising gradually; continued softening should lift continuing claims.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or below $88,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the intraday low on any UTC day is ≤ $88,000 per Coinbase BTC-USD, CoinDesk XBX Index, or Bloomberg consolidated crypto pricing.
monitoring_signals: Stablecoin net flows and BTC ETF net creations/redemptions
Funding rates and perpetual futures basis
Dollar index (DXY) and real yields
Risk-off equity moves and crypto liquidations data
predictions.rationale: Risk-off and tighter liquidity raise downside tail risks after a large run-up; volatility remains elevated.

predictions.text: PHLX Semiconductor Index (SOX) will close at or below 4,600 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the official daily closing level of the SOX index is ≤ 4,600 on any trading day by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: AI server order revisions and memory pricing
Export controls and chip sanctions headlines
10Y Treasury yield and equity risk premium
Earnings/guide from NVDA, TSMC, ASML, AMD
predictions.rationale: Valuation sensitivity to yields and AI cycle wobbles creates drawdown risk in semis.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or above 4.75% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using FRED series DGS10 daily close; success if any observation through 2025-11-30 is ≥ 4.75%.
monitoring_signals: Treasury auction tails and bid-to-cover ratios
CPI/PPI/PCE prints and inflation breakevens
MOVE index and term premium estimates
Fiscal headlines (shutdown, issuance mix)
predictions.rationale: Term premium and supply risks could push yields higher during risk-off or weak auctions.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €45.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if ICE Endex official front-month TTF settlement price is ≥ €45.00/MWh on any trading day through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: ECMWF/NOAA temperature anomalies for NW Europe
LNG arrival schedules and FSRU availability
Norwegian/UKCS outages and Russian flows via Ukraine
European storage levels and withdrawal rates
predictions.rationale: Early-winter cold snaps and supply hiccups can trigger sharp TTF spikes even from comfortable storage levels.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the UN Security Council will adopt a resolution explicitly authorizing a Gaza stabilization or peacekeeping force with a mandate of at least 12 months.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the UNSC formally adopts a resolution (S/RES/####) that authorizes a multinational force in Gaza with a mandate ≥12 months, per UN press releases or meeting records.
monitoring_signals: UNSC agenda and draft text circulation
Positions of permanent members (US, China, Russia, France, UK)
Regional diplomacy (Egypt, Qatar, Israel, Palestinian Authority)
Ceasefire/hostilities developments
predictions.rationale: Substantial veto risk and unresolved political questions make rapid UNSC authorization unlikely.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Sudan will experience at least one nationwide or multi-region internet blackout lasting 12 or more consecutive hours, as reported by NetBlocks or Cloudflare Radar.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if NetBlocks or Cloudflare Radar publishes a report showing Sudan’s internet connectivity disrupted across major regions or nationally for ≥12 consecutive hours within the window.
monitoring_signals: Conflict intensity and clashes in Khartoum/Darfur
Reports of infrastructure damage or deliberate shutdowns
Telecom operator advisories
Humanitarian/security updates from UN/OCHA
predictions.rationale: Escalating conflict increases the odds of deliberate or incidental network disruptions.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security will publish in the Federal Register a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking to expand biometric collection to include at least one of iris scans or DNA.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if a DHS/USCIS/CBP NPRM appears in the Federal Register proposing expanded biometric modalities (explicitly iris and/or DNA).
monitoring_signals: OIRA/OMB reg agenda updates
DHS press releases or blog posts
Federal Register proposed rule notices
Congressional oversight statements
predictions.rationale: Public DHS signaling suggests near-term movement to formalize expanded biometrics via rulemaking.

predictions.text: Cboe Nasdaq-100 Volatility Index (VXN) will close at or above 25.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the official Cboe-reported daily close for VXN is ≥ 25.00 on any trading day by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Mega-cap tech earnings/guides and AI demand signals
Rates volatility (MOVE) and term premium
Large downside gaps in QQQ/Nasdaq-100
Skew and VVIX dynamics
predictions.rationale: AI-led tech weakness and macro uncertainty can spike Nasdaq-focused implied volatility.

predictions.text: As of 2025-11-10 00:00 UTC, a lapse in U.S. federal appropriations will still be in effect (the government shutdown will not yet have ended).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if, by 2025-11-10 00:00 UTC, no continuing resolution or appropriations law has been enacted and OMB has not issued guidance ending the shutdown, as confirmed by OMB and major outlets.
monitoring_signals: House/Senate floor schedule and CR text
White House statements and OMB memos
Senate cloture votes and whip counts
Agency contingency plan updates
predictions.rationale: Political gridlock risks slippage beyond the near-term deadline despite pressure to end the shutdown.

predictions.text: CME Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures (NG) will settle at or below $2.80 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the official CME/NYMEX settlement for the front-month NG contract is ≤ $2.80/MMBtu on any trading day by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: U.S. weather HDDs vs normal
EIA weekly storage and balances
Production and pipeline maintenance updates
LNG feedgas flows and export terminal status
predictions.rationale: Mild weather, high storage, and strong production could briefly pressure front-month gas below $2.80.
